name: Dongtube Api'S
description: Simple and easy to use API documentation.

items.name: LuminAI
items.desc: Advanced AI assistant powered by LuminAI for intelligent conversations

params.text: Text message for the AI to respond to

items.name: Blue Archive
items.desc: Get random high-quality Blue Archive character images

items.name: Anime Quotes
items.desc: Fetch random quotes from anime characters

items.name: BRAT Generator
items.desc: Generate BRAT-style text images with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT image (required)

items.name: BRAT Video Generator
items.desc: Generate animated BRAT-style text videos with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT video (required)

items.name: TikTok Downloader
items.desc: Scrape TikTok video/photo/slideshow with HD links

items.name: Pinterest Downloader
items.desc: Download images, videos, or GIFs from Pinterest pins

items.name: SaveFrom Downloader
items.desc: Scrape video, audio, or image links from various platforms via SaveFrom.net

items.name: Image Upscaler
items.desc: Upscale images via PicsArt AI, supports URL or file upload

params.url: Image URL to upscale (optional if uploading file)

text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT image (required)
